item.title: The Google Blackhole: Forced renewal of certificates with nginx-letsencrypt-docker
item.description:
So when somebody believes his or her favourite scam site,

e.g LinkedIn.___ does not index my page

and they ask op to renew a certificate … but the only thing known is that docker-nginx-letsencrypt (jwilder) does a renewal for all “due” certificates ( 21 days or less left )

it is one of this “0 hits on google.com” days ..

until now …

docker exec -it nginx-letsencrypt /bin/bash /app/force_renew

is your friend in that case ;)
